Header.title: LEAP INTO FINANCIAL EXCELLENCE
Header.paragraph: Customized Accounting, Payroll, Tax, and Finance Services for Your Business Needs.
Header.subparagraph: Panamera Groups offers versatile outsourced financial services including: accounting, payroll, tax, and finance solutions. We offer customize solutions to suit businesses at any stage of their lifecycle. Our professional services are offered on an hourly or fixed rate basis.

About.heading: Your Trusted Accounting Partner for Offshore Growth and Efficiency
About.paragraph1: We are your professional accounting outsourcing partner to help you build and grow an offshore team. We provide businesses with outsourced accounting, payroll, tax and finance solutions on a fixed fee basis. No matter your size, we can tailor our service to fit your needs at every stage of your company's life cycle.
About.paragraph2: At Panamera, we create value for our clients by simply following a specialized outsourcing process. This process helps us to establish seamless transition and also quick completion of the project assigned to us within the agreed time and a pre-determined budget.

dos: Understand your business and your specific needs
Strive for excellence accredited to our core completencies and technological supremacy
Value human expertise with a pool of dedicated, result-droven experts
Delivery guarantee by going to far-reaching length to present quality outsourcing services
Integrate with your in-house existing team members by providing valuable support services
donts: Forget you once you have signed up
Neglect data security - the highest level of data security and data is housing in the USA

Panamera Groups offers versatile outsourced financial services including: accounting, payroll, tax, and finance solutions. We offer customize solutions to suit businesses at any stage of their lifecycle. Our professional services are offered on an hourly or fixed rate basis.
